short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quesam - Your Daily Window into Employee Engagement. Say goodbye to lengthy surveys. Quesam is here to redefine feedback.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quesam is a tool that allows you to change your new tab in chrome for the Quesam survey tool. It allows users to answer daily questions within their browser without the need to open an email or link to take a survey.  Login and registration is easy allowing users who how have no available survey to simply search the web. The extension also uses the top sites feature to show you fast links to your most visited websites. Quesam is a daily pulse inside your organization. The Quesam extension also supports both light and dark modes, and users may switch at their convenience.
